C1.name: Cluster Autoscaler version matches cluster version
C1.description: The Cluster Autoscaler's version should match the Kubernetes cluster version for compatibility

C2.name: Auto Discovery is enabled
C2.description: Auto Discovery should be enabled unless you have specific advanced use cases

C3.name: Node groups have proper auto-discovery tags
C3.description: Node groups must have the required tags for auto-discovery to work

C4.name: Least privileged IAM role with scoped permissions
C4.description: IAM role should follow least privilege principle with actions scoped to specific Auto Scaling Groups

C5.name: Identical scheduling properties within node groups
C5.description: Each node in a node group should have identical scheduling properties (labels, taints, resources)

C6.name: Prefer fewer node groups with many nodes
C6.description: Node groups with many nodes are preferred over many node groups with fewer nodes for scalability

C7.name: Use EKS Managed Node Groups
C7.description: EKS Managed Node Groups provide automatic discovery and graceful termination features

C8.name: Use Spot Instances with proper diversification
C8.description: Spot instances can save up to 90% cost but require proper diversification strategy

C9.name: Separate On-Demand and Spot capacity
C9.description: Isolate On-Demand and Spot instances into separate Auto Scaling Groups due to different scheduling properties

C10.name: Configure appropriate expander strategy
C10.description: Expander strategy determines which node group to scale for cost optimization

C11.name: Appropriate resource allocation for Cluster Autoscaler
C11.description: Cluster Autoscaler needs sufficient CPU and memory resources for large clusters

C12.name: Optimize scan interval for cluster size
C12.description: Scan interval should be balanced between responsiveness and API rate limiting

C13.name: Configure overprovisioning for reduced latency
C13.description: Overprovisioning trades cost for improved pod scheduling latency

C14.name: Protect expensive workloads from eviction
C14.description: Long-running or expensive workloads should be protected from scale-down eviction
